title: Astra Gameplay Reveal Trailer - VALORANT
author: VALORANT
description:
She’s already got it all planned out. Harness the cosmos and control the fight as Astra, the newest Agent in VALORANT.

Play VALORANT: https://riot.com/3idlntG
